more-info: More information to follow here soon
para1: Hello! We are very excited that you are planning to share our special day with us! We have created this website to share relevant and useful information about the wedding so you can plan your trip.
para2: We include information about where the ceremony and reception will take place, how to get there, suggestions for places to stay and ideas for what to do whilst you are in Madrid.
para3: We will update this page as we get closer to the big day. In the meantime, if you have any questions or need anything, please don't hesitate to contact us at carmel.drake@gmail.com or castro170376@gmail.com.
